<p align="left">
<font size="4" face="Verdana"><u><b>Installation:</b></u></font>
</p>
<p align="left">
<font size="3" face="Verdana">Instructions for installing QuTiP can be found in the <a href="http://code.google.com/p/qutip/wiki/Documentation">documentation</a>, or in the install.txt file included in the downloaded QuTiP source folder.  Note that while QuTiP versions <b>1.x</b> will work on all major operating systems, versions starting with <u><b>2.x</b> do not officially support the Microsoft Windows operating system</u>.  We have decided to focus on writing new functionality, rather than figuring out work-arounds for Windows' many issues.</font>
</p>


<br>
<p align="left">
<font size="4" face="Verdana"><u><b>Obtaining Previous Versions and Source Code:</b></u></font>
</p>

<p align="left">
<font size="3" face="Verdana">In general we do not recommend downloading previous versions of QuTiP.  However if you are interested in depreciated releases, you can download all previous versions of QuTiP from the <a href="http://code.google.com/p/qutip/downloads/list?can=1">main downloads page</a>.  If you want to checkout the latest source code (which may contain bugs) then head on over to the <a href="http://code.google.com/p/qutip/source/list">source page</a>.</font>
</p>
